title: Kadhal Sudgudu Lyrics From Alaipayuthey
stanzas:
Kadhal sudgudu gudu
kannae thodu thodu (3)

alaiye sittraliye
karai vandhu vandhu
pogum alaiye

enai thoduvaai medhuvaai
padarvaai endraal
nuraayai karayum alaye

tholaivil paarthaal
aamaam engindraai
arugil vandhal illai
endraai

nagila nagila nagilaa
o ho vilagida vilagida
nagila nagila nagilaa
o ho vilagida vilagida

pazhagum podhu kumari
aagi ennai velvaai penne
padukkarayil kuzhandhai aagi
ennai kolvaai kannae.

kadhal saugudu gudu
kannae thodu thodu..(4)

neeraaattum nerathil
en annai aagindraai
vaalaattum nerathil
en pillai aagindraai

naanaaga thottaalum
mullaagi pogindraai
neeyaaga thottaalum
poovaaga aagindraai

en kanneer en kanneer
ellaame nee anbae
en inbam en thunbam
ellaame nee anbae

en vazhum en saavum
un kannin asaivilae.

nagila nagila nagilaa
o ho vilagida vilagida
nagila nagila nagilaa
o ho vilagida vilagida

pazhagum podhu kumari
aagi ennai velvaai penne
padukkarayil kuzhandhai aagi
ennai kolvaai kannae.

kadhal saugudu gudu
kannae thodu thodu..(4)

unnullam naan kaana
enaayil podhaadhu
en anbai naan solla
unkaalam podhaadhu

en kadhal vilai enna
un nenju kaanaadhu
aanaalum en muththam
sollamal podhaadhu

kondaalum kondraalum
en sondham nee thaane
nindraalum sendraalum
un sondham naanthanae

un vaetkai pinnaale
en vazhkai valayudhe.

nagila nagila nagilaa
o ho vilagida vilagida
nagila nagila nagilaa
o ho vilagida vilagida

pazhagum podhu kumari
aagi ennai velvaai penne
padukkarayil kuzhandhai aagi
ennai kolvaai kannae.

kadhal saugudu gudu
kannae thodu thodu..(4)
